4305360.name: 6RAVITY CUBE
4305360.description:
A gravity-shifting puzzle action game where you guide a mysterious cube to the goal by switching gravity across six directions.

Set inside a colorful, minimalist 20m³ cubic stage, each of the six faces—front, back, left, right, floor, and ceiling—has its own distinct color.

The cube floating within the stage cannot be touched, pushed, or carried by the player.

The only way to move it is by using gravity switches, each linked to the color of a specific face of the stage.

Pressing a switch activates gravity toward the matching face, causing the cube to fall in that direction—sometimes onto walls, sometimes even onto the ceiling.

Players must read the stage layout, time their actions carefully, and use various structures and gimmicks to guide the cube safely to the glowing goal.

Each stage features a variety of hazards, including spikes, harmful liquid, collapsing floors, moving platforms, and more.

Some stages also require the use of rafts that rise and fall with changing water levels, combining vertical movement with gravity control.

This is a stage-based puzzle game that emphasizes logical thinking and decision-making, while occasionally demanding quick reactions.

Across more than 30 stages, you’ll face increasingly complex and satisfying gravity-based puzzles.

Key Features

- A unique puzzle structure set inside a fixed 20m³ cubic space

- Six-direction gravity switching linked to the colors of each face

- A core rule where the player cannot touch the cube—movement is controlled only through switches

- Various hazards such as spikes, harmful liquid, collapsing floors, and moving platforms

- Vertical puzzle layouts featuring rafts that rise and fall with changing water levels

- Gameplay focused on logic, timing, and situational judgment

- Over 30 progressively challenging stages

- Minimalist, colorful visuals and intuitive controls

Master gravity and guide the cube to the goal.
